summary: A container class that stores optional loss tensors for the different pretraining objectives of the FLAVA model, including masked image modeling, masked language modeling, imageâ€‘text matching, global contrastive similarity, and masked multimodal components, and offers helper functionality to assess their presence.
business_intent: Enable streamlined management, aggregation, and inspection of multiple FLAVA pretraining loss values to simplify loss computation, monitoring, and logging during model training.
